raw_transcript: The third major skill that entrepreneurs bring to the table or must bring to the table now that they didn't have to bring before. You need to know in a very fine grained way where value lies in your product. You know how I said software was a blunt hammer before? Like when you buy Salesforce, Salesforce might be really crappy in a lot of different spots, but because it has existing distribution relationships with a lot of big companies, the buyer doesn't really care and so it doesn't get better. It's different in the micro niches I'm talking
